_header: Del shall into well and reach I-worth
_description: Fragment(?) of a political prophecy — three monorhyming lines

CamCCC313.Transcription:
…del sal into waille and rache ywurþeoþer sal into
                    hyre and gedi ywuþeþridde sal in engle al uor
                    wurþe
CamCCC313.Note:
Added to lower margin by a contemporary (thirteenth-century)
                    hand.
CamCCC313.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Corpus
                Christi College, Cambridge.
         Cambridge: at the UP, 1912: 2.117.
